Package codeConstructsEvaluation.transformation

Class ASTConverterClient

java.lang.Object
codeConstructsEvaluation.transformation.ASTConverterClient
public class ASTConverterClient extends Object
The helper service to convert AST to Code and back -additional tools to get certain elements from AST are provided
Author:
Jakub Perdek
